name: Helicopter Air Stricke War 2016
description:
"Class arcade game with tons of action and beautiful graphics." - ReviewGames

A deadly force is approaching! The enemy has launched a surprise attack on your home front. Defend yourself and get ready for a brutal war against ferocious opponents.

Complete missions in Episode mode inspired by real-life conflicts.
Challenge yourself and your friends by completing the missions or replaying and creating custom missions!

Gorgeous graphics.
Game center integrated. Compete for a spot in the top 10!
Enjoy the clean and classic arcade user interface.
Non stop action and mass destruction aerial attacks.
3D flight simulation gameplay.
